rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains reassuring cues ('will not enter the food system', 'strongest AI surveillance program').
The segment describes capability ('strongest AI surveillance program'), not significant scale or impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Contains a bare negation ('will not enter the food system') and a superlative boast not linked to public safety.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
